text: Zhen zhu chuangzao nimen, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou, shi nimen chengwei pei'ou. Renhe nuren de huaiyun he fenmian, wu yi jian bushi ta suo zhidao de; zengjia chang ming zhe de shou shu, jianshao duanming zhe de nianling, wu yi jian bu jilu zai tian jing zhong; na dui zhen zhu shi rongyi de.
